identifier.description: The alphanumeric code identifying the specific security record (e.g., sr-109-001).

title.description: Short summary or name of the security finding.

risk_rating.description: The severity level of the risk (e.g., high, medium, low).

status.description: The current state of the finding (e.g., open).

description.description: Detailed text explaining the nature of the vulnerability or misconfiguration found.

recommendation.description: Suggested remediation steps to address the identified risk.

affects.description: The specific assets or accounts where the finding was identified.
